abstract: New York City police have responded to over 800 calls reporting suspicious packages around city since explosion in Chelsea neighborhood; police spokesman says sharp increase in calls is normal after such attacks.
lead_paragraph: Since a bomb exploded in Chelsea, the police have responded to more than 800 reports of suspicious packages in New York City, far more than usual.
snippet: Since a bomb exploded in Chelsea, the police have responded to more than 800 reports of suspicious packages in New York City, far more than usual....

headline.main: If You See Something, Say Something — and New Yorkers Have, in Droves
headline.print_headline: Calls to Police on Packages Rise Sharply After Bomb
